name: Y TO MOVE
description:
This is a short, but complete game which I made for the Brackeys Jam 2022 and is definitely not a puzzle game.

(This can only be played on a computer)

Bugs To Know About:  When you are clicking the "about", "play", or "How To Play" buttons, the game will restart your progress, so make sure to click the correct buttons again and then click the button you think goes next.

Hints:

1.  press 'TAB' 

2.   N/A

3.  Keys on a keyboard in a triangular array the first line/letter of the poem, one missing

4.  Is it the end?

How do you know once your done?(SPOILER):This game can be confusing and frustrating, but once you get to the second title screen, you will be finished.  There is an extra bit with an illusion, but that is just extra and does not lead anywhere.
